author: Staff Reporter
text:
Stating that title deeds for house sites were not given to them despite Madras High Court’s order, villagers from Mallur picketed the Collectorate on Friday.

According to the protestors, more than 120 families were residing at Ambedkar Nagar in Mallur in thatched houses on government land. “We submitted petitions to officials demanding title deeds. Later, we approached the Madras High Court that ordered the administration to provide title deeds to us. But the officials refuse to issue title deeds,” they said.

They said that members of other community had blocked the road leading to their houses and were also felling trees in their area. They staged a sit-in-protest outside the Collectorate. Police personnel pacified them and allowed a few to submit petitions to Collector’s personal assistant. Following this, the villagers withdrew their protest.
title: Villagers demand title deeds; stage protest
